text: recessive inheritance - Babinski sign - Bowel incontinence - Clonus - Distal amyotrophy - Dysarthria - Hypoplasia of the corpus callosum - Intellectual disability - Lower limb muscle weakness - Lower limb spasticity - Macular degeneration - Mood swings - Pes cavus - Phenotypic variability - Progressive - Psychosis - Reduced visual acuity - Spastic gait - Spastic paraplegia - Urinary bladder sphincter dysfunction - Urinary incontinence - Urinary urgency - Visual impairment - The Human Phenotype
